biotools.summary: PASER for automated analysis of neural signals recorded in pulsating magnetic fields | PASER: Processing and Analysis Schemes for Extracellular Recordings | Currently, PASER can only be used with data saved by Open Ephys GUI [Ref. 4], specifically .continuous files. See https://github.com/open-ephys/plugin-GUI or http://www.open-ephys.org/ for more information

bioschemas.name: PASER
bioschemas.summary: PASER for automated analysis of neural signals recorded in pulsating magnetic fields | PASER: Processing and Analysis Schemes for Extracellular Recordings | Currently, PASER can only be used with data saved by Open Ephys GUI [Ref. 4], specifically .continuous files. See https://github.com/open-ephys/plugin-GUI or http://www.open-ephys.org/ for more information
